tag.description: Data sheet providing Excel like editing, frozen columns and rows, copy/paste, sorting, etc.

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: The style class to apply dynamically to the selected column.
attribute.name: currentColClass

attribute.description: The style class to apply dynamically to the selected row.
attribute.name: currentRowClass

attribute.description: The message to be displayed if no records exist in the sheet.
attribute.name: emptyMessage

attribute.description: A global error message to be added when the Sheet is invalid. If not specified, no global message is added. If specified, a global message will be added with this value.
attribute.name: errorMessage

attribute.description: The number of columns to fix or freeze on the left when scrolling.
attribute.name: fixedCols

attribute.description: The number of rows to fix or freeze on the top when scrolling.
attribute.name: fixedRows

attribute.description: The height of the sheet in pixels. It is recommended you use this property instead of a style class to ensure it is applied to the proper element. This can be left empty, but performance may suffer.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: An el expression resolving to a unique key value for each row. Required.
attribute.name: rowKey

attribute.description: The style class to apply each row.
attribute.name: rowStyleClass

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the column headers.
attribute.name: showColumnHeaders

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the row headers.
attribute.name: showRowHeaders

attribute.description: Property to be used for sorting.
attribute.name: sortBy

attribute.description: Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending". Valid values are "ascending" and "descending".
attribute.name: sortOrder

attribute.description: The Handsontable StretchH value. Affects rendering of the column widths. Valid values are "none", "hybrid", "last", "all".
attribute.name: stretchH

attribute.description: The additional style classes for the rendered table. Multiple classes may be specified delimited by a space.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The additional style classes for header. Multiple classes may be specified delimited by a space.
attribute.name: headerStyleClass

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Datasource of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener

attribute.description: Name of the iterator variable used to refer each data.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: The width of the sheet in pixels. For auto width, leave empty.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Boolean value to allow or disable manual column resize. Enabled by default.
attribute.name: manualColumnResize

tag.description: Data sheet column used to define the available columns in a Sheet component.

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: The column data entry type. Currently supports "text" and "numeric". "date", "autocomplete" and "checkbox" are experimental.
attribute.name: colType

attribute.description: The column width in pixels.
attribute.name: colWidth

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: Property to be used for filtering.
attribute.name: filterBy

attribute.description: A collection of selectitems for filter dropdown.
attribute.name: filterOptions

attribute.description: The header text to display above the column.
attribute.name: headerText

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify whether the column should be rendered as a read only column. This is more efficient then cell by cell, but renders the entire column as read only. The var value may not be referenced.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify whether the cell should be rendered as a read only. The EL expression may reference the var value.
attribute.name: readonlyCell

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Property to be used for sorting.
attribute.name: sortBy

attribute.description: Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending". Valid values are "ascending" and "descending".
attribute.name: sortOrder

attribute.description: The additional style classes for the rendered table cell. Multiple classes may be specified delimited by a space.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Comment
attribute.name: comment

attribute.description: The value to bind to this column.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener
